book.title: Isla and the Happily Ever After (Anna and the French Kiss, #3)

review.body: SO MANY FEELINGS. SO SO SO GOOD.

book.title: THE FIVE MINUTE KINDLE E-BOOK FORMULA 2016: The Secret Source to Get Thousands of Original Kindle Books Pre-Written For You ... For As Low As $27 Each

review.body:
It delivers (but not much)

Promises a lot - and you do get more than nothing - but in the end you will need to invest cash of some unspecified amount to get some unmarketable fiction that you then need to invest in again to produce an untested manuscript to sell to an unidentified market. [Just po...
Wah fighting-nya cakep gila!!!

book.title: Murder Most Vile Volume 1: 18 Shocking True Crime Murder Cases (True Crime Murder Books)

review.body:
More great stories

Mr. Sellers books cover a wide range of the notorious, and this one was no exception. Many grisly cases I hadn't heard of before.

book.title: Needles and Pearls: A Beach Street Knitting Society Novel

review.body:
I liked this one for basically the same reasons I liked the last one. It was cozy, and is just someone's daily life, and I'm definitely in the mood for that right now. In fact, I read all three of these books between 7 pm last night and 3 am this morning, and had a great time.

But if reading about...
We need more books like this. People who are different. White people are a tired story.

book.title: Manners & Mutiny (Finishing School, #4)
book.publisher: Little, Brown Books for Young Readers

review.body:
Here's the thing- listening to this series, all I've really cared about is the wittiness. Between the narrator's delivery and Carringer's writing, there is some seriously clever dialogue.

The story itself I could take or leave.

But the overwhelming feeling I've gotten in each of these books is sim...

In this book all of the guys end up together for Jonathan and Cole's wedding in Paris. All of them have changed so much, and they actually reach some understandings they never thought they would. I really liked this story and just seeing them all come to a good place with their partners and their...
THIS BOOK HAD ME SO EXCITED! I love backstory or any kind of story and this book filled me with happiness! Derek Landy, as per usual, did not let me down! :)

Fooling Around With Cinderella by Stacy Juba

Jaine Andersen is a smart, marketing job seeker who has decided that, after visiting with her young niece, an aging, family-owned amusement park needs her expertise. Storybook Valley Amusement Park isnâ€™t looking for a marketing director but agrees to re...
Great fun series, really enjoyed this fantasy world.

very good

liked the series fell in love with each of the Cowboys..... I read the blues series and loved it I enjoyed this one too

book.title: The Whole-Brain Child: 12 Revolutionary Strategies to Nurture Your Child's Developing Mind, Survive Everyday Parenting Struggles, and Help Your Family Thrive

review.body: I used this book for my senior research project on child development. The book offered great insight on how the child's mind works and I was able to get a lot of information for my project. However, the book itself seemed to drag on a little bit in my opinion. The authors over-elaborated on the g...
A really good conclusion to the series. A little on the long side though.

Empowering children's book that encourages children to follow their dreams, and never be afraid of failure, because the only failure can come if you quit. I especially enjoyed the connection to Rosie the Riveter, an icon for women empowerment. While the book empowers all children, the connection...

Eh, this is a weak 3 stars. Just not as compelling as her Blackbirds book.

Plus, the ending wasn't all that satisfying.

This book was amazing, I was at a very hard time in my life with no escape. For whatever reason I always went to the library but never read a book. Then the Librarian had me check this out, in sheer boredom and loneliness I began to read on the hour long bus ride home. I will forever be grateful...

book.title: Make It Fly!: How To Build Backlinks That Actually Works?

review.body: It's an amazing work of Awan. I highly recommend this eBook for all the SEOs and bloggers who are straggling with link building.
